text.text: Securing the Temiskaming Testing Laboratory was a Strategic decision to consolidate the camp

PolyMet Labs first purchased the facility in 2000 and began operating as an Assay Laboratory, and Bulk Sampling, Crushing, Grinding, Processing, Upgrading, and Smelting Plant. When the facility became available again in 2020, Canada Silver Cobalt Inc. purchased it through subsidiary Temiskaming Testing Laboratories Inc.
